## MODAL "CUSTOMBOX"
[https://github.com/dixso/custombox](https://github.com/dixso/custombox)

## ANIMATED PROGRESSBARS (BOOTSTRAP BASED)
[https://github.com/minddust/bootstrap-progressbar](https://github.com/minddust/bootstrap-progressbar)

## CIRCLE PROGRESSBARS "KNOB"
[https://github.com/aterrien/jQuery-Knob](https://github.com/aterrien/jQuery-Knob)

## DATE PICKER (BOOTSTRAP BASED)
[https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker](https://github.com/eternicode/bootstrap-datepicker)

## RESP.CALENDAR
[http://w3widgets.com/responsive-calendar/](http://w3widgets.com/responsive-calendar/)

## CUSTOM SCROLLBARS
[https://github.com/malihu/malihu-custom-scrollbar-plugin](https://github.com/malihu/malihu-custom-scrollbar-plugin)

## CUSTOM SELECTS "SELECT2"
[https://github.com/select2/select2](https://github.com/select2/select2)

## CUSTOM CHECKBOX & RADIO "iCHECK"
[https://github.com/fronteed/iCheck](https://github.com/fronteed/iCheck)

## RANGE SLIDER "ION"
[https://github.com/IonDen/ion.rangeSlider](https://github.com/IonDen/ion.rangeSlider)

## HTML SLIDER "BXSLIDER"
[https://github.com/stevenwanderski/bxslider-4](https://github.com/stevenwanderski/bxslider-4)

## TOOLTIPS "TOOLTIPSTER"
[https://github.com/iamceege/tooltipster](https://github.com/iamceege/tooltipster)

## ON ENTER VIEWPORT "ONSCREEN" (trigger events/scrollspy)
[https://github.com/silvestreh/onScreen](https://github.com/silvestreh/onScreen)

## MASONRY "FREEWALL"
[https://github.com/kombai/freewall](https://github.com/kombai/freewall)

## RESPONSIVE IMAGES POLLYFILL "PICTUREFILL"
[https://github.com/scottjehl/picturefill](https://github.com/scottjehl/picturefill)
